mapper.insert: INSERT INTO td_numbers( kname, ksex, kage, knum, kwxh, laidianrq, dilily, status, remark, laiyuanqd, requirement, targetbuild, staff, c_level, u_id ) VALUES ( #{entity.kname}, #{entity.ksex}, #{entity.kage}, #{entity.knum}, #{entity.kwxh}, #{entity.laidianrq}, #{entity.dilily}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.laiyuanqd}, #{entity.requirement}, #{entity.targetbuild}, #{entity.staff}, #{entity.c_level}, #{entity.u_id} )

INSERT INTO td_uc_middle( u_id, u_name, c_id, c_name, uc_startdate, uc_enddate,
author_id, author_name, creat_date ) VALUES ( #{entity.u_id}, #{entity.staff}, #{entity.id}, #{entity.kname}, NOW(), "2050-12-30 00:00:00",
#{entity.u_id}, #{entity.staff}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id AS "id", kname AS "kname", ksex AS "ksex", kage AS "kage", knum AS "knum", laidianrq AS "laidianrq", kwxh AS "kwxh", laiyuanqd AS "laiyuanqd", dilily AS "dilily", status AS "status", remark AS "remark", requirement AS "requirement", targetbuild AS "targetbuild", staff AS "staff" FROM td_numbers ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM `td_numbers` a , `td_uc_middle` b
WHERE b.`u_id`=a.`u_id` AND b.`c_id` = a.id AND NOW() between b.`uc_startdate` and b.`uc_enddate`
AND b.u_id=#{filter.userId}
ORDER BY b.`uc_startdate` DESC
